name: TopCat.instContinuousMapClass
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
‚ä¢ ContinuousMapClass (Quiver.Hom X Y) ‚ÜëX ‚ÜëY
decl:
instance instContinuousMapClass (X Y : TopCat) : ContinuousMapClass (X ‚ü∂ Y) X Y :=
  inferInstanceAs <| ContinuousMapClass C(X, Y) X Y

name: TopCat.id_app
initialProofState:
X : TopCat
x : ‚ÜëX
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id X) x) x
decl:
@[simp]
theorem id_app (X : TopCat.{u}) (x : ‚ÜëX) : (ùüô X : X ‚ü∂ X) x = x := rfl

name: TopCat.comp_app
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g) x) (g (f x))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem comp_app {X Y Z : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : Y ‚ü∂ Z) (x : X) :
    (f ‚â´ g : X ‚Üí Z) x = g (f x) := rfl

name: TopCat.coe_id
initialProofState:
X : TopCat
‚ä¢ Eq (‚áë(CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id X)) id
decl: @[simp] theorem coe_id (X : TopCat.{u}) : (ùüô X : X ‚Üí X) = id := rfl

    (f ‚â´ g : X ‚Üí Z) = g ‚àò f := rfl

name: TopCat.hom_inv_id_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
x : ‚ÜëX
‚ä¢ Eq (f.inv (f.hom x)) x
decl:
@[simp]
lemma hom_inv_id_apply {X Y : TopCat} (f : X ‚âÖ Y) (x : X) : f.inv (f.hom x) = x :=
  DFunLike.congr_fun f.hom_inv_id x

name: TopCat.inv_hom_id_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
y : ‚ÜëY
‚ä¢ Eq (f.hom (f.inv y)) y
decl:
@[simp]
lemma inv_hom_id_apply {X Y : TopCat} (f : X ‚âÖ Y) (y : Y) : f.hom (f.inv y) = y :=
  DFunLike.congr_fun f.inv_hom_id y

name: TopCat.coe_of
initialProofState:
X : Type u
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace X
‚ä¢ Eq (‚Üë(TopCat.of X)) X
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_of (X : Type u) [TopologicalSpace X] : (of X : Type u) = X := rfl

name: TopCat.coe_of_of
initialProofState:
X Y : Type u
inst‚úù¬π : TopologicalSpace X
inst‚úù : TopologicalSpace Y
f : ContinuousMap X Y
x : (CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).obj (TopCat.of X)
‚ä¢ Eq (f x) (f x)
decl:
/--
Replace a function coercion for a morphism `TopCat.of X ‚ü∂ TopCat.of Y` with the definitionally
equal function coercion for a continuous map `C(X, Y)`.
-/
@[simp] theorem coe_of_of {X Y : Type u} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y]
    {f : C(X, Y)} {x} :
    @DFunLike.coe (TopCat.of X ‚ü∂ TopCat.of Y) ((CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).obj (TopCat.of X))
      (fun _ ‚Ü¶ (CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).obj (TopCat.of Y)) HasForget.instFunLike
      f x =
    @DFunLike.coe C(X, Y) X
      (fun _ ‚Ü¶ Y) _
      f x :=
  rfl

name: TopCat.hom_apply
initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq (f x) (f.toFun x)
decl: lemma hom_apply {X Y : TopCat} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (x : X) : f x = ContinuousMap.toFun f x := rfl

decl:

name: TopCat.isoOfHomeo_hom
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : Homeomorph ‚ÜëX ‚ÜëY
‚ä¢ Eq (TopCat.isoOfHomeo f).hom ‚Üëf
decl:
/-- Any homeomorphisms induces an isomorphism in `Top`. -/
@[simps]
def isoOfHomeo {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y) : X ‚âÖ Y where
  -- Porting note: previously ‚ü®f‚ü© for hom (inv) and tidy closed proofs
  hom := (f : C(X, Y))
  inv := (f.symm : C(Y, X))
  hom_inv_id := by ext; exact f.symm_apply_apply _
  inv_hom_id := by ext; exact f.apply_symm_apply _

name: TopCat.isoOfHomeo_inv
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : Homeomorph ‚ÜëX ‚ÜëY
‚ä¢ Eq (TopCat.isoOfHomeo f).inv ‚Üëf.symm
decl:
/-- Any homeomorphisms induces an isomorphism in `Top`. -/
@[simps]
def isoOfHomeo {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y) : X ‚âÖ Y where
  -- Porting note: previously ‚ü®f‚ü© for hom (inv) and tidy closed proofs
  hom := (f : C(X, Y))
  inv := (f.symm : C(Y, X))
  hom_inv_id := by ext; exact f.symm_apply_apply _
  inv_hom_id := by ext; exact f.apply_symm_apply _

name: TopCat.homeoOfIso_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
a : ‚ÜëX
‚ä¢ Eq ((TopCat.homeoOfIso f) a) (f.hom a)
decl:
/-- Any isomorphism in `Top` induces a homeomorphism. -/
@[simps]
def homeoOfIso {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÖ Y) : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y where
  toFun := f.hom
  invFun := f.inv
  left_inv x := by simp
  right_inv x := by simp
  continuous_toFun := f.hom.continuous
  continuous_invFun := f.inv.continuous

name: TopCat.homeoOfIso_symm_apply
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
a : ‚ÜëY
‚ä¢ Eq ((TopCat.homeoOfIso f).symm a) (f.inv a)
decl:
/-- Any isomorphism in `Top` induces a homeomorphism. -/
@[simps]
def homeoOfIso {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÖ Y) : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y where
  toFun := f.hom
  invFun := f.inv
  left_inv x := by simp
  right_inv x := by simp
  continuous_toFun := f.hom.continuous
  continuous_invFun := f.inv.continuous

name: TopCat.of_isoOfHomeo
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : Homeomorph ‚ÜëX ‚ÜëY
‚ä¢ Eq (TopCat.homeoOfIso (TopCat.isoOfHomeo f)) f
decl:
@[simp]
theorem of_isoOfHomeo {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y) : homeoOfIso (isoOfHomeo f) = f := by
  -- Porting note: unfold some defs now
  dsimp [homeoOfIso, isoOfHomeo]
  ext
  rfl

name: TopCat.of_homeoOfIso
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : CategoryTheory.Iso X Y
‚ä¢ Eq (TopCat.isoOfHomeo (TopCat.homeoOfIso f)) f
decl:
@[simp]
theorem of_homeoOfIso {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚âÖ Y) : isoOfHomeo (homeoOfIso f) = f := by
  -- Porting note: unfold some defs now
  dsimp [homeoOfIso, isoOfHomeo]
  ext
  rfl

name: TopCat.isIso_of_bijective_of_isOpenMap
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
hfbij : Function.Bijective ‚áëf
hfcl : IsOpenMap ‚áëf
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.IsIso f
decl:
lemma isIso_of_bijective_of_isOpenMap {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y)
    (hfbij : Function.Bijective f) (hfcl : IsOpenMap f) : IsIso f :=
  let e : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y := Homeomorph.homeomorphOfContinuousOpen
    (Equiv.ofBijective f hfbij) f.continuous hfcl
  inferInstanceAs <| IsIso (TopCat.isoOfHomeo e).hom

name: TopCat.isIso_of_bijective_of_isClosedMap
initialProofState:
X Y : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
hfbij : Function.Bijective ‚áëf
hfcl : IsClosedMap ‚áëf
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.IsIso f
decl:
lemma isIso_of_bijective_of_isClosedMap {X Y : TopCat.{u}} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y)
    (hfbij : Function.Bijective f) (hfcl : IsClosedMap f) : IsIso f :=
  let e : X ‚âÉ‚Çú Y := Homeomorph.homeomorphOfContinuousClosed
    (Equiv.ofBijective f hfbij) f.continuous hfcl
  inferInstanceAs <| IsIso (TopCat.isoOfHomeo e).hom

name: TopCat.isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso
initialProofState:
X Y Z : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso g
‚ä¢ Iff (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áë(CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)) (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áëf)
decl:
theorem isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso {X Y Z : TopCat} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : Y ‚ü∂ Z) [IsIso g] :
    IsOpenEmbedding (f ‚â´ g) ‚Üî IsOpenEmbedding f :=
  (TopCat.homeoOfIso (asIso g)).isOpenEmbedding.of_comp_iff f

name: TopCat.openEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso
initialProofState:
X Y Z : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso g
‚ä¢ Iff (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áë(CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)) (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áëf)
decl:
@[deprecated (since := "2024-10-18")]
alias openEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso := isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso

name: TopCat.isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso'
initialProofState:
X Y Z : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso g
‚ä¢ Iff (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).map f) ((CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).map g))) (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áëf)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso' {X Y Z : TopCat} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : Y ‚ü∂ Z) [IsIso g] :
    IsOpenEmbedding ((forget TopCat).map f ‚â´ (forget TopCat).map g) ‚Üî IsOpenEmbedding f := by
  simp only [‚Üê Functor.map_comp]
  exact isOpenEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso f g

name: TopCat.openEmbedding_iff_comp_isIso'
initialProofState:
X Y Z : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso g
‚ä¢ Iff (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).map f) ((CategoryTheory.forget TopCat).map g))) (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áëf)
decl:
@[deprecated (since := "2024-10-18")]

name: TopCat.isOpenEmbedding_iff_isIso_comp
initialProofState:
X Y Z : TopCat
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.IsIso f
‚ä¢ Iff (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áë(CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g)) (Topology.IsOpenEmbedding ‚áëg)
decl:
theorem isOpenEmbedding_iff_isIso_comp {X Y Z : TopCat} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : Y ‚ü∂ Z) [IsIso f] :
    IsOpenEmbedding (f ‚â´ g) ‚Üî IsOpenEmbedding g := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ intro h
    convert h.comp (TopCat.homeoOfIso (asIso f).symm).isOpenEmbedding
    exact congrArg _ (IsIso.inv_hom_id_assoc f g).symm
  ¬∑ exact fun h => h.comp (TopCat.homeoOfIso (asIso f)).isOpenEmbedding
